org.deidentifier.arx.criteria

Class KAnonymity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deidentifier.arx.criteria.PrivacyCriterion
      • org.deidentifier.arx.criteria.ImplicitPrivacyCriterion
        • org.deidentifier.arx.criteria.KAnonymity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class KAnonymity
extends ImplicitPrivacyCriterion
    The k-anonymity criterion Published in: Sweeney L. k-anonymity: A model for protecting privacy. International Journal of Uncertainty, Fuzziness and Knowledge-Based Systems. 2002;10(5):557 - 570.
    See Also:
